  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Función exponencial</string>
            <string language="en">Exponential function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exponentialfunktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonction exponentielle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Função exponencial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzione esponenziale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκθετική λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de función exponencial. Se analizan gráficamente diferentes ejemplos de funciones exponenciales, haciendo énfasis en la función exponencial con el número e por base.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of exponential function. Several graphical examples of exponential functions are analysed, emphasizing the exponential function with base e.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">base</string>
            <string language="en">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponente</string>
            <string language="en">exponent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponencial</string>
            <string language="en">exponential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">número e</string>
            <string language="en">number e</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept von Exponentialfunktion zu erklären. 
Einige graphische Beispiele von Exponentialfunktion werden 
analysiert und heben Exponentialfunktion mit Unterseite e hervor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la fonction exponentielle. 
Plusieurs exemples graphiques des fonctions exponentielles sont 
analysés, soulignant la fonction exponentielle avec la base e.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito da função exponencial. Diversos exemplos gráficos 
de funções exponenciais são analisados, emfatizando a função 
exponencial com base e.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto della funzione esponenziale. Parecchi 
esempi grafici delle funzioni esponenziali sono analizzati, danti 
risalto alla funzione esponenziale con la base e.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της εκθετικής λειτουργίας. 
Διάφορα γραφικά παραδείγματα των εκθετικών λειτουργιών 
αναλύονται, υπογραμμίζοντας την εκθετική λειτουργία με τη βάση ε.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterseite</string>
          </keyword>
